msContents.summary: Account of beer rendered by the beer shop of Tebtynis to Psyphis, son of Onnophris, as president of the guild of priests of Tebtynis

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto (see also text a: division of property)
Archive of Kronion son of Apion, nomographos of the grapheion of Tebtynis

condition.ab: Text b was originally written on a separate sheet (25 x 27.4 cm), which was later; the left-hand margin of the will overlaps the right-had side of the accounts about 5.5 cm, and covers the right-hand column of figures of the latter. The sheet bearing text b was trimmed off at the bottom, and the lower edge of the last line of writing in the second column was cut away.

handDesc.p: Small upright cursive; written under dictation (as shown by the subscription of Psyphis), a fact that may account for the somewhat ungrammatical, but colloquial, style of some of the passages. Several of the subscriptions were written by slow-writers.

origin.origPlace: Tebtynis, Polemonos meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Psoiphis (Psyphis) son of Onnophris, prostates synodou hiereon

provenance.p: Tebtynis, Polemonos meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: Year 11 of Tiberius Claudius Caesar Augustus Germanicus Imperator, supplementary statement of the beer (rendered by) the beer shop of Tebtynis, (addressed) to Psoiphis, son of Onnophris, president of the guild of the priests.
